AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.paragraph1: Technology enthusiast, passionate about programming and IT infrastructure. Currently, I'm a Full Stack Development intern at CGE/RO, working in the Innovation and Corruption Prevention Unit.
AboutSection.paragraph2: I'm always looking to improve my skills and contribute with innovative solutions, combining academic knowledge with practical experience to face challenges and create positive impact.
